message.content:
cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.PF, cs.PL, cs.AR

Reasoning: 
- cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) is the most likely category as the paper presents a sorting algorithm designed for manycore GPUs, which are commonly used in parallel computing.
- cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) is also likely as the paper discusses the performance of different sorting algorithms and their suitability for different types of data.
- cs.PF (Performance) is another possible category as the paper focuses on the performance of the sample sort algorithm on GPUs.
- cs.PL (Programming Languages) is a less likely category, but still possible as the paper discusses the implementation of the algorithm in CUDA, a programming language commonly used for GPU programming.
- cs.AR (Hardware Architecture) is also a less likely category, but still possible as the paper discusses the performance of the algorithm on manycore GPUs, which are a type of hardware architecture.
